Description: TITLEAttention! Seeking Full-Time Real Estate Agents: Competitive Salary, Benefits, and Growth Opportunities Await!DESCRIPTIONWe are currently seeking a highly motivated and experienced real estate agent to join our team on a full-time basis. As a real estate agent with our company, you will have the opportunity to work with a diverse range of clients, helping them buy, sell, and rent properties. NOTE: English, Chinese, and Russian are strongly encouraged to apply.Benefits:- Competitive salary package- Paid vacation and sick leave- Professional development and training opportunities- Supportive and collaborative work environmentSkills
Skills: - Proven experience as a real estate agent, preferably in the local market
- Proficient in using CRM software and other real estate tools
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Generate leads through various channels, including referrals, networking, and online marketing
- Conduct property viewings and provide accurate information to potential buyers or renters
- Assist clients in negotiating and closing real estate deals
- Stay up-to-date with the local real estate market trends and property values
- Prepare and present offers, contracts, and other necessary documents
- Provide exceptional customer service and build long-lasting relationships with clients
- Collaborate with other team members to achieve sales targets and company objectives
